column4: ok I looked through the ndiswrapper documents and they seem way too technical I downloaded the ndisgtk and installed the right driver for my broadcom card which is bcmwl5 and its not showing any wireless networks yet is there anything else I should do?
Type "ndiswrapper -i" in a terminal, and tell us what it says.
just make sure you do "ndiswrapper -ma" first. <-- What does that do?
are you sure you typed the name right? There should be some text.
